properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) AS count FROM USER_INFO WHERE STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT USER_NO, USER_ID, USER_PWD, USER_NAME, USER_BIRTH, INTEREST_MOVIE, INTEREST_DISPLAY, INTEREST_SHOW, EMAIL, PHONE, GRADE_NO, STATUS FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, USER_NO, USER_ID, USER_PWD, USER_NAME, USER_BIRTH, INTEREST_MOVIE, INTEREST_DISPLAY, INTEREST_SHOW, EMAIL, PHONE, GRADE_NO, STATUS FROM ( SELECT USER_NO, USER_ID, USER_PWD, USER_NAME, USER_BIRTH, INTEREST_MOVIE, INTEREST_DISPLAY, INTEREST_SHOW, EMAIL, PHONE, GRADE_NO, STATUS FROM USER_INFO ORDER BY USER_NO DESC ) ) WHERE RN BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT USER_NO, USER_ID, USER_PWD, USER_NAME, USER_BIRTH, INTEREST_MOVIE, INTEREST_DISPLAY, INTEREST_SHOW, EMAIL, PHONE, GRADE_NO, STATUS FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, USER_NO, USER_ID, USER_PWD, USER_NAME, USER_BIRTH, INTEREST_MOVIE, INTEREST_DISPLAY, INTEREST_SHOW, EMAIL, PHONE, GRADE_NO, STATUS FROM ( SELECT USER_NO, USER_ID, USER_PWD, USER_NAME, USER_BIRTH, INTEREST_MOVIE, INTEREST_DISPLAY, INTEREST_SHOW, EMAIL, PHONE, GRADE_NO, STATUS FROM USER_INFO WHERE USER_NO = ? ORDER BY USER_NO DESC ) ) WHERE RN BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT USER_NO, USER_ID, USER_PWD, USER_NAME, USER_BIRTH, INTEREST_MOVIE, INTEREST_DISPLAY, INTEREST_SHOW, EMAIL, PHONE, GRADE_NO, STATUS FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, USER_NO, USER_ID, USER_PWD, USER_NAME, USER_BIRTH, INTEREST_MOVIE, INTEREST_DISPLAY, INTEREST_SHOW, EMAIL, PHONE, GRADE_NO, STATUS FROM ( SELECT USER_NO, USER_ID, USER_PWD, USER_NAME, USER_BIRTH, INTEREST_MOVIE, INTEREST_DISPLAY, INTEREST_SHOW, EMAIL, PHONE, GRADE_NO, STATUS FROM USER_INFO WHERE USER_ID LIKE ? ORDER BY USER_NO DESC ) ) WHERE RN BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT USER_NO, USER_ID, USER_PWD, USER_NAME, USER_BIRTH, INTEREST_MOVIE, INTEREST_DISPLAY, INTEREST_SHOW, EMAIL, PHONE, GRADE_NO, STATUS FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, USER_NO, USER_ID, USER_PWD, USER_NAME, USER_BIRTH, INTEREST_MOVIE, INTEREST_DISPLAY, INTEREST_SHOW, EMAIL, PHONE, GRADE_NO, STATUS FROM ( SELECT USER_NO, USER_ID, USER_PWD, USER_NAME, USER_BIRTH, INTEREST_MOVIE, INTEREST_DISPLAY, INTEREST_SHOW, EMAIL, PHONE, GRADE_NO, STATUS FROM USER_INFO WHERE USER_NAME LIKE ? ORDER BY USER_NO DESC ) ) WHERE RN BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) AS count FROM USER_INFO WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND USER_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) AS count FROM USER_INFO WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND USER_ID LIKE ?
SELECT COUNT(*) AS count FROM USER_INFO WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND USER_NAME LIKE ?

SELECT e.USER_NO "user_no", e.USER_ID "user_id", e.USER_PWD "user_pwd", e.USER_NAME "user_name", e.USER_BIRTH "user_birth", a.CATEGORY_NAME "category_name1", b.CATEGORY_NAME "category_name2", c.CATEGORY_NAME "category_name3", e.EMAIL "email", e.PHONE "phone", d.GRADE_NAME "grade_name", e.STATUS "status" FROM USER_INFO e LEFT JOIN CATEGORY_INFO a ON e.INTEREST_MOVIE = a.CATEGORY_TYPE LEFT JOIN CATEGORY_INFO b ON e.INTEREST_DISPLAY = b.CATEGORY_TYPE LEFT JOIN CATEGORY_INFO c ON e.INTEREST_SHOW = c.CATEGORY_TYPE LEFT JOIN GRADE d ON e.GRADE_NO = d.GRADE_NO WHERE USER_NO = ?
UPDATE USER_INFO SET USER_ID = ?, USER_PWD = ?, USER_NAME = ?, USER_BIRTH = ?, EMAIL = ?, PHONE = ?, GRADE_NO = ? WHERE USER_NO = ?
